subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: San Luis, Santos Laguna, Tigres and Atlas will play in this year’s SuperLiga along with Chicago, Chivas USA, Kansas City and New England. The third edition of the eight-team tournament will start June 20 and end Aug. 5, Major League Soccer said. The top M.L.S. teams from last year’s regular season who were not in the Concacaf Champions League were invited along with the top four Mexican clubs that were not in the region’s top club tournament.
